resources.string: "Themes is a system app. It provides wallpapers and multiple personalization options. You'll still be able to use Themes via Settings after you remove the Home screen shortcut."
For using and saving themes, wallpaper, ringtones, and fonts
Displays more info about the list item.
"Can't apply this item in Second space"
Your current theme settings have been backed up.
An error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
"Couldn't connect to the network. Check your network settings and try again."
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Connect to the internet to view more
"This feature isn't available in Extreme mode. Turn off Extreme mode to be able to use it."
"You won't be charged by your carrier for sending gifts"
"Theme can't be gifted more than %1$s times."
An SMS message will be sent to this person when the theme is delivered.
Gift history is listed in your Account page.
You purchased %1$s as a gift. To send it, go to your Themes Account page.
"This theme isn't compatible with the version of MIUI installed on your device. Some parts of MIUI might not work properly if you apply this theme."
"Home screen wallpaper applied. Can't apply Lock screen wallpaper."
"Lock screen wallpaper applied. Can't apply Home screen wallpaper."
The ringtone is applied to both SIM cards.
Welcome to Themes! This app provides the following personalization services:
"Couldn't find themes. Check out our recommendations below"
"Couldn't find wallpapers. Check out our recommendations below"
View the ad you saved when you were offline
"You'll get a notification with the link when you're back online"
"We'll send you a notification with a link to the advertiser site."
Give your device a new look
Receive content recommendations based on your preferences
Show transition from Lock screen to Home screen on theme covers
By toggling off the switch, you withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Themes.
"Couldn't download. Try the Default or Classic theme."
Select one of the several default themes
Access and save files on this device
Account error. Wait a minute or two and try again.
Sign in to your Mi Account now
"You haven't sent your comment yet. Discard changes?"
You can tell us what you think here.
Your feedback is extremely important to us.
Touch the stars to rate the theme
Not so fast! Come back after you use this theme a bit longer.
You can leave the first comment!
Your comment is too long. Shorten it and try again.
The comment you entered is invalid
Your comment will be displayed after a brief review.
You need to apply the theme before you can write comments about it
You need to sign in first
Your comment will be displayed after a brief review.
The code you entered has expired.
The code you entered has already been used.
Yikes! An unknown error occurred. Sign in at http://market.xiaomi.com to view your payment status.
"You've received a gift code (%2$s) for the theme %1$s in MIUI's Themes. Tap %3$s to use it now."
Gift code for %1$s: %2$s. When you send it to another MIUI user, they can use it to download this theme.
"The theme associated with the code you entered isn't available."
Use this code to download items from Themes.
This code can be used to download any theme in the store.
The format of the code you entered is incorrect.
"Code was not verified. Make sure you've entered it correctly."
10 devices have already been authorized on this account
This theme is no longer available.
Themes from third-party sources are not supported
No app was found to handle this action.
"Even though you've already purchased %1$d components in this theme, it's still cheaper if you buy the full bundle."
This theme is no longer available.
"You've already purchased %1$d components in this theme. It's cheaper if you buy the remaining components individually."
Unfortunately, our server is down at the moment.
"Here's a theme I thought you might like: %1$s! Link: %2$s"
Trial of %1$s expired. Complete purchase if you like it.
Make sure your system clock is set to the correct time.
Some elements of the previously used theme might not be compatible with the new version of MIUI. Incompatible elements will be replaced by default options.
"Go back to the theme you've been using before the update"

By toggling off the switch, you withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Themes. We will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period as required by applicable laws. Themes needs to collect necessary personal information to provide you with basic services. Your withdrawal of consent to its Privacy Policy will be held as refusing to accept its services based on collected personal information.
Your device needs to connect to the network for you to be able to withdraw consent. Check your network settings and try again.
"Couldn't play ad. You can download this item now!"
Watching ad videos will allow you to download premium themes and reward our designers. Watch now?
Watching ad videos will allow you to download live wallpapers and reward our designers. Watch now?
Finish watching video to download this premium theme. Watch now?
Finish watching video to download this wallpaper. Watch now?
Before using ringtones from Themes, read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy.
Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
Applied theme successfully. Wallpaper Carousel is off.
Themes allow you to customize multiple UI elements across the system.
"You haven't added any themes to favorites."
Themes app will restart immediately to apply this setting.

". This app needs to connect to the internet to work normally. "
Show the Terms of Use pop-up every time you open the Themes app. This setting will take effect after you reboot your device.
Notification shade, Phone, Messaging, etc. Uncheck to use default options.
Home screen wallpaper and clock. Uncheck to use default options.
Home screen icons. Uncheck to use default options.
Lock screen wallpaper and clock. Uncheck to use default options.
"Couldn't open this page. Wait a minute or two and try again."
"You've deleted updates. Reboot device to be able to use themes."

Your app is up to date
A network error occurred. Try again.
Your theme has a new version available

string.name: user_authorization_dialog_message
string.Data: "We need to collect necessary personal information to provide you with the basic services. You can learn how we handle the information we collect in our Privacy Policy. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using Themes. You can withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Themes in the Settings at any time."

resources.string: An update for this theme is available.
Update downloaded themes via Wi-Fi automatically when the screen is locked
Using mobile data may generate additional fees. Continue anyway?
Before using wallpapers from Themes, read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy.
Wallpapers give your Home screen a fresh look.
Connect to the network and try again.
Use mobile data to download updates?
Download and install Mi AI voice assistant to continue.
